page.title: 19PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: One of the most popular games we play in the playground is Chase.There is a similar game but when you are caught you link hands and the two end people have to catch the others. We also play a game called Stuck in the Mud. Somebody has to hold out their hands with their fingers open and the rest of the children each hold a finger. The person holding out their hand says any rhyme and when they say "Stuck in the Mud" you must let go of the persons finger and you must run off. In the summer the girls like skipping.We say rhymes like,"high, low,swing,dolly,pepper,salt,normal, scissors".In the autumn we play conkers.Conkers are really horse chestnuts.You put them on a string and try to hit the other persons conker and smash it.
